member.name: DTTOPTS
member.summary: Defines the options for the function.

summary.para: A combination of flags that specify whether certain values of the DTTOPTS structure have been specified, and how to interpret these values. This member can be a combination of the following.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
The crText member value is valid.
The crBorder member value is valid.
The crShadow member value is valid.
The iTextShadowType member value is valid.
The ptShadowOffset member value is valid.
The iBorderSize member value is valid.
The iFontPropId member value is valid.
The iColorPropId member value is valid.
The iStateId member value is valid.

The pRect parameter of the function that uses this structure will be used as both an in and an out parameter. After the function returns, the pRect parameter will contain the rectangle that corresponds to the region calculated to be drawn.
The fApplyOverlay member value is valid.
The iGlowSize member value is valid.
The pfnDrawTextCallback member value is valid.

Draws text with antialiased alpha. Use of this flag requires a top-down DIB section. This flag works only if the HDC passed to function has a top-down DIB section currently selected in it. For more information, see Device-Independent Bitmaps.

DTT_TEXTCOLOR | DTT_BORDERCOLOR | DTT_SHADOWCOLOR | DTT_SHADOWTYPE | DTT_SHADOWOFFSET | DTT_BORDERSIZE | DTT_FONTPROP | DTT_COLORPROP | DTT_STATEID | DTT_CALCRECT | DTT_APPLYOVERLAY | DTT_GLOWSIZE | DTT_COMPOSITED.

member.name: DTTOPTS.crText
member.summary: Specifies the color of the text that will be drawn.

member.name: DTTOPTS.crBorder
member.summary: Specifies the color of the outline that will be drawn around the text.

member.name: DTTOPTS.crShadow
member.summary: Specifies the color of the shadow that will be drawn behind the text.

summary.para: Specifies the type of the shadow that will be drawn behind the text. This member can have one of the following values.

listheader.description: Value
Meaning
No shadow will be drawn.
The shadow will be drawn to appear detailed underneath text.
The shadow will be drawn to appear blurred underneath text.

member.name: DTTOPTS.ptShadowOffset
member.summary: Specifies the amount of offset, in logical coordinates, between the shadow and the text.

member.name: DTTOPTS.iBorderSize
member.summary: Specifies the radius of the outline that will be drawn around the text.

member.name: DTTOPTS.iFontPropId
member.summary: Specifies an alternate font property to use when drawing text. For a list of possible values, see .

member.name: DTTOPTS.iColorPropId
member.summary: Specifies an alternate color property to use when drawing text. If this value is valid and the corresponding flag is set in dwFlags, this value will override the value of crText. See the values listed in for the nIndex parameter.

member.name: DTTOPTS.iStateId
member.summary: Specifies an alternate state to use. This member is not used by .

member.name: DTTOPTS.fApplyOverlay
member.summary: If TRUE, text will be drawn on top of the shadow and outline effects. If FALSE, just the shadow and outline effects will be drawn.

member.name: DTTOPTS.iGlowSize
member.summary: Specifies the size of a glow that will be drawn on the background prior to any text being drawn.

member.name: DTTOPTS.lParam
member.summary: Parameter for callback back function specified by pfnDrawTextCallback.
